result.markdown: --- title: "KIND training" --- This is a set of training materials supporting the KIND network's series of one-off training sessions. ## How to use these materials + these pages contain the materials for the range of one-off training sessions provided by NHS Education for Scotland's KIND learning network + all our sessions are designed to be delivered live on Teams + all these materials are creative-commons licenced, so please feel free to reuse within those conditions + these sessions are periodically re-run, so please get in touch if you'd find it helpful to have one or more sessions re-offered ## Thanks These materials owe a huge debt to the many members of the KIND community who have contributed. More specifically, these pages are based on [Melissa Van Bussell's video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=arzBRW5XIkg) describing, with absolute clarity, how to deploy Quarto websites to GitHub pages.
